original_title: Glowing Fireplace with Acoustic Christmas Music
overview: Enjoy 3 hours of Glowing Fireplace with Acoustic Christmas Music in this ambient fireplace film. Brilliant flames and glowing coals paired with calm and soft instrumental hymns create the perfect holiday ambiance.
tagline: Warm Up with the Ambiance of a Glowing Fireplace with Christmas Music
title: Glowing Fireplace with Acoustic Christmas Music
